rooms.name: Entrance Hallway and Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious area combining the entry zone with a living space. The design incorporates Brutalist elements such as exposed concrete textures and angular forms, in line with local building norms.
rooms.vastu_alignment: North-South axis preferred for the main entrance

rooms.name: Dedicated Home Office
rooms.description: A separate, well-lit home office space located near the living area. The design emphasizes functionality and minimalistic aesthetics with a robust finish typical of Brutalist style.

rooms.name: Kitchen and Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated kitchen and dining area designed with a compact yet functional layout. The use of concrete finishes is complemented by durable countertops.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom and Bathroom
rooms.description: A luxurious master suite with a private bathroom. The space is designed to provide privacy and tranquility with ample storage, high ceilings, and natural light.

rooms.name: Studio Area / Guest Room
rooms.description: A split-level area functioning as a studio or guest room. The space is designed to be flexible, combining the need for a personal workspace with guest accommodation.

notes: The design leverages the plot's dimensions (30x40 feet) with a split-level approach to maximize space utilization.
Local building norms are adhered to, incorporating sustainable materials and structural integrity as per Indian standards.
Vastu principles have been integrated by aligning rooms appropriately for prosperity, health, wealth, and creativity.
